profile:
Welcome to AB Granito Restorations Ltd.

“YOUR NATURAL STONE RESTORATION SPECIALISTS!”

Where can you turn to repair your valuable granite, marble, and limestone in your home? AB Granito is your Calgary and area specialist when it comes to repairing or installing natural stone and quartz countertops.

We take our responsibilities seriously and aim for your complete satisfaction. We will not rest until the job is done.
If your granite, marble, limestone, and quartz countertops, floors and showers have stains, scratches, cracks, or dull areas you don’t like, the good news is they can be fixed, giving back their original pristine finish. AB Granito Restorations Ltd. has the workmanship, techniques, and tools needed to bring your countertops, floors and showers back to their original graceful look. Simply call us for help with all your stone repair, prevention, and maintenance needs.

OUR SERVICES:

RESTORATION, REPAIR, AND INSTALLATION OF STONE SURFACES.
SURFACES WE TOUCH: QUARTZ, MARBLE, GRANITE, SLATE, TRAVERTINE, AND LIMESTONE.

NATURAL STONE COUNTERTOPS
-Repairs
-Refinish
-Installation
-Maintenance
-Sealing

STONE FLOORS & SHOWERS
-Repair
-Restoration
-Maintenance
-Deep Cleaning
-Grout Cleaning

We offer our services in the following Calgary and area communities:
*Red Deer	*Strathmore	*Cochrane
*High River	*Chestermere	*Airdrie
*Okotoks	*Canmore/Banff	*Lethbridge



Please call us for a free, no-risk, immediate consultation.
Reach us at (403) 452-4633.
products:
Home Improvement
Natural stone restoration specialist in floors,
countertops, and showers.
We specialize in marble, slate, granite, and more.
services:
NATURAL STONE CARE RESTORATION: FLOORS 
Is your natural stone floor, limestone, marble or slate, looking etched, worn-out, dull, or losing grout?

Got ceramic and porcelain tile showers? 

Restoration of scratched, damaged, or dull natural stone floors. If your marble, limestone, travertine, granite, or slate floor is tired of daily wear and tear, dirt, and foot traffic. We can take care of it. Resealing stone floors is highly recommended at least once a per year. We provided the following services:

​

    -Re-polish and re-seal, bring back their original honed, matte, or polished look. 

    -Clean, stripping, and re-seal slate floors.

    -Honed marble, travertine, and limestone floors.

    -Repair non-structural cracks, fissures, and holes in any stone flooring.

    -Deep cleaning, patching, and re-sealing tile and grout.


RESIDENTIAL TILE & GROUT:

DEEP CLEANING

We use the latest and most advanced technology in the market today to restore your floors back to their natural beauty.  Leaving your home looking cleaner and feeling healthier for you and your family.​

​

Benefits:

-Our process removes dirt, grime, oil & bacteria from your tile and grout lines

-Restores floors to a "like new" appearance

-Our EPA approved and environmentally friendly solutions leave floors cleaned and sanitized

-All work is a guarantee with high-quality control, Licensed, insure and highly trained technicians

​COMMERCIAL TILE & GROUT:

CLEANING & SEALING

We specialize in floor care, minimal downtime, and all work is guaranteed.

We do commercial cleaning and sealing for areas such as lobbies, breezeways, pool decks, restrooms, restaurants, sidewalks, and more.

​

We use the latest and most advanced technology in the market today to ensure the protection of your investment. Fast and more efficient than traditional floor cleaning methods.

​

Benefits:

-Our process removes dirt, grime, and bacteria from your tile lines.

Restores your floors to a "like-new" appearance

-We use environmentally friendly solutions

-Licensed, insured, and highly trained technicians

profile:
Established in the City of Calgary, Lucky Granite Ltd. is a family owned and operated business. We specialize in customizing granite, marble, and quartz. Located not far from downtown, our fabrication facility provides cutting-edge technology and craftsmanship to ensure each project is polished to perfection.

With over a decade of experience, our highly skilled professionals deliver the finest services and innovative ideas that fit your every need. Our team operates in a safe and secure manner while completing installations on time.

We endeavour in serving you better by offering competitive prices and it is our passion to excel beyond customer satisfaction. No job is too big or small. We complete the job within 1 week! We’ll work with you to turn your kitchen and bathroom ideas into reality.

profile:
At Warieka Cabinetry we specialize in affordable kitchen and bathroom products and services. We proudly serve Calgary and area with customized design and unique exclusive products both residential and multi-unit commercial properties. With over 30 years of combined experience in cabinetry and design, our team has the skills and knowledge to turn your kitchen and bathroom dreams into reality.

We care about your budgets and needs and are here to help. You will find a wide range of high quality cabinet products to choose from at unbeatable prices. Best selection at wholesale prices! Visit our showroom at Shop 1 1901 Center Street NW in Calgary and look through our stock of kitchen and bathroom products. Our expert staff will help guide you through as well as answer any questions that you may have.
